sentences.en: A new serial is starting on television tonight.
sentences.cn: 今晚电视开播一部新的电视连续剧.

sentences.en: A serial counter is also called a ripple counter.
sentences.cn: 串行计数器亦叫脉冲型计数器.

sentences.en: All the bills had the same serial number. The cash was counterfeit.
sentences.cn: 所有钞票的序列号都是一样的。这些钱是伪钞。

sentences.en: Can you account for the serial failures in our experiment?
sentences.cn: 你能解释我们实验屡屡失败的原因 吗 ?

sentences.en: Counters can be generally classified as either serial or synchronous.
sentences.cn: 计算器通常可分为串行和同步两类.

sentences.en: Descriptive of a device which converts a serial input into a parallel output.
sentences.cn: 描述一种设备能把串行输入转换成并行输出的功能.

sentences.en: He could never ever give any responses to his captor other than name, rank, serial number and date of birth.
sentences.cn: 除姓名、军衔、部队编号和出生年月外，他再也不肯回答俘获他的人的任何问题。
他还报了他的军籍编号.

sentences.en: He started a magazine serial about a scientific detective.
sentences.cn: 他开始着杂志上一篇科学侦探的连载小说.

sentences.en: Keep the questions in the same serial order .
sentences.cn: 让这些问题保持原来的顺序。

sentences.en: Some teletypes are equipped with EIA - RS 232 C in a serial configuration.
sentences.cn: 有些电传打字机用EIA-RS232C装备成串行方式.

sentences.en: That's a radio serial in ten parts.
sentences.cn: 那是一部十集广播连续剧.

sentences.en: The procedure of converting serial data into parallel data.
sentences.cn: 将串行数据转换为并行数据的过程或方法.

words.tran_cn: 连载；（英）写成连载长篇而刊登（等于serialization）
序列化；串行化；连载长篇
电视连续剧；[图情]期刊；连载小说

phrases.tran_cn: 一系列谋杀事件的凶手，杀人恶魔
[电]串联处理；按序编制程序，串编程序

trans.tran_cn: 连续的，连载的，顺序排列的，分期偿付的
trans.tran_en: arranged or happening one after the other in the correct order

trans.tran_cn: 连载小说，电视连续剧，定期刊物，[军]行军梯队
trans.tran_en: a story that is broadcast or printed in several separate parts on television, in a magazine etc
